changeSet.createView: SELECT n.*, a.alarmid, a.eventuei, a.ipaddr, a.reductionkey, a.alarmtype, a.counter, a.severity, a.lasteventid, a.firsteventtime, a.lasteventtime, a.firstautomationtime, a.lastautomationtime, a.description, a.logmsg, a.operinstruct, a.tticketid, a.tticketstate, a.suppresseduntil, a.suppresseduser, a.suppressedtime, a.alarmackuser, a.alarmacktime, a.managedobjectinstance, a.managedobjecttype, a.applicationdn, a.ossprimarykey, a.x733alarmtype, a.qosalarmstate, a.clearkey, a.ifindex, a.stickymemo, a.systemid, (a.alarmacktime NOTNULL) AS acknowledged, COALESCE(s_cat.categoryname, 'no category') AS categoryname, s_cat.categorydescription, s.servicename, nas.max_alarm_severity, nas.max_alarm_severity_unack, nas.alarm_count_unack, nas.alarm_count FROM node n JOIN alarms a ON n.nodeid = a.nodeid JOIN node_alarm_status nas ON a.nodeid = nas.nodeid LEFT JOIN service s ON a.serviceid = s.serviceid LEFT JOIN category_node cat ON n.nodeid = cat.nodeid LEFT JOIN categories s_cat ON cat.categoryid = s_cat.categoryid
